p: LSS is one of the most significant parameters in many laser materials processes [ 41] and it also applies to LSTH. Samples #6, #8, and #9 had the same input parameters with different LSS. In Section 4.1, Figure 7a,b deeply explained the effect of varying the LSS in the LSTH process. By the same trend, the effect of LSS on micro-hardness distribution can be observed in Figure 9.
